info.game_comments: Champion's winnings matched to the Families of Freedom Scholarship Fund ($10,000 minimum).

(1, 1).clue: In 1982 Bertha Wilson became this western hemisphere nation's first female supreme court justice

(3, 1).clue: A maiden is a horse that has never done this (no not that)
